dotnetType.name: Int64ResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.Int64" />;
            an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves long (64-bit signed integer) type information.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Int64ResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
